data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3298518,"name":"joel truher","username":"truher","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/truher/{size}/172222_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-31T04:52:36.541Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHey everybody, I thought you might enjoy an inexpensive absolute encoder option; the AMS 5048 produces \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePWM\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Pulse Width Modulation\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e output, and it’s available in a sort of “\u003ca href=\"https://ams.com/en/as5048aadapterboard\"\u003eevaluation board\u003c/a\u003e” for about $15 direct or via Digikey, Mouser, etc.   Using a 3d-printed case and solder-wire-to-board (\u003cimg src=\"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/images/emoji/google/frowning.png?v=12\" title=\":frowning:\" class=\"emoji\" alt=\":frowning:\" loading=\"lazy\" width=\"20\" height=\"20\"\u003e) we integrated these sensors into our \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eWCP\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"West Coast Products\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e Legacy SwerveX modules, and it all seems to be working fine wired directly to RoboRIO DIO and using the WPI DutyCycleEncoder class.  Cases available at \u003ca href=\"https://grabcad.com/library/encoder-case-1\"\u003eGrabcad\u003c/a\u003e.  It doesn’t matter which version of the 5048 you use: they both produce \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePWM\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Pulse Width Modulation\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2024-01-31T04:52:36.541Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":88,"readers_count":87,"score":47.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":452757,"topic_slug":"encoders","display_username":"joel truher","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://ams.com/en/as5048aadapterboard","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"AS5048AAdapterBoard | ams","clicks":14},{"url":"https://grabcad.com/library/encoder-case-1","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":1}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53190,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/encoders/452757/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3496407,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2025-01-30T04:53:18.200Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
